byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Steven P. Jobs made Apple into a technology behemoth and filled the world with products he dreamed up.
snippet: Steven P. Jobs made Apple into a technology behemoth and filled the world with products he dreamed up.
lead_paragraph: Steven P. Jobs of Apple, who died of cancer on Wednesday, was a visionary who made the technology company he co-founded one of the world's biggest.

headline.main: A Look Back at Steve Jobs
